docs: Gender (simplified).

com.example.accelstorage.AccelBatch.name: com.example.accelstorage.AccelBatch
docs: A batch of sample series.

com.example.accelstorage.AccelSample.name: com.example.accelstorage.AccelSample
docs: One sample from accelerometer sensor.

com.example.accelstorage.AccelSeries.name: com.example.accelstorage.AccelSeries
docs: A series of samples from the accelerometer sensor.

com.example.accelstorage.IceCreamOfTheDa.name: com.example.accelstorage.IceCreamOfTheDayReply
docs: Replies to ice cream surveys.

com.example.accelstorage.IceCreamOfTheDa.name: com.example.accelstorage.IceCreamOfTheDaySurvey
docs: Ice cream surveys.

com.example.accelstorage.TimeRange.name: com.example.accelstorage.TimeRange
docs: A time range.

com.example.accelstorage.AccelStorage.name: com.example.accelstorage.AccelStorage

store.name: store
docs: Procedure to store a series of samples. The time range of
samples stored is returned.

get_last.name: get_last
docs: Procedure that returns the last series of samples stored

on_store.name: on_store
docs: Event fired when a sample batch was stored. The time range
of the stored samples is provided as event payload.

fetch_batch.name: fetch_batch
docs: Fetch all sample series within the given time range as one batch.

fetch_stream.name: fetch_stream
docs: Fetch all sample series within the given time range.
Sample series are returned as streaming, "progressive results".

store_batch.name: store_batch
docs: Bulk upload sample batches.

store_stream.name: store_stream
docs: Bulk upload sample batches.
Sample batches are provided as streaming, "progressive call arguments"

average_batch.name: average_batch
docs: Compute sliding window average of sample using bulk transformation
of batches of samples.

average_stream.name: average_stream
docs: Compute sliding window average of sample using a streaming transformation
receiving arguments and producing results in a full duplex stream.

on_new_icecream_survey.name: on_new_icecream_survey
docs: Ice cream surveys are published as events on this topic.
Define an interface for accelerometer storage services.

on_new_survey.name: on_new_survey
docs: Ice cream surveys are published as events on this topic.
